messages.title: HIGH SPEED RAIL
messages.content: David Lidington and the Tories will deny you the right to a full consultation on High Speed 2 and will press ahead with HS2.

messages.title: High Speed 2 Disaster!
messages.content: Steven said 'This proposal is fully costed and would be funded by cancelling the proposed HS2. This could save projects by £3bn.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems will reopen Steven and the Lib Dems will re-think the network of fast tracks and old lines of rail, costed by cancelling proposed HS2, saving projects by £3bn.
Critiques the environmental implications of HS2 plans and stresses the need to protect Stoke Mandeville.
Local rail improvements are mentioned as alternative ways of addressing transportation needs.

mentions.candidate: Steven will vote against these plans if re-elected as our MP.

issues.environment: David Lidington and the Tories will deny you the right to a full consultation on High Speed 2 and will press ahead with HS2.

politicalExperience.achievements: Steven is described as an informed commentator, Lib Dem transport spokesman, and Parliamentary heavyweight familiar with the issues raised by the local community.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on opposing HS2 and offering alternative transport options, and highlights the necessity to address local concerns such as environmental impact. It provides contact information and emphasizes Steven's readiness to actively assist with the issue.
